extensions.name: DevLens
extensions.summary: Quickly inspect page layouts and visualize element boundaries.

extensions.name: StyleSpy
extensions.summary: Instantly analyze and copy CSS from any webpage element.

extensions.name: SpeedBoost
extensions.summary: Optimizes browser resource usage to accelerate page loading.

extensions.name: JSONWizard
extensions.summary: Formats, validates, and prettifies JSON responses in-browser.

extensions.name: TabMaster Pro
extensions.summary: Organizes browser tabs into groups and sessions.

extensions.name: ViewportBuddy
extensions.summary: Simulates various screen resolutions directly within the browser.

extensions.name: Markup Notes
extensions.summary: Enables annotation and notes directly onto webpages for collaborative debugging.

extensions.name: GridGuides
extensions.summary: Overlay customizable grids and alignment guides on any webpage.

extensions.name: Palette Picker
extensions.summary: Instantly extracts color palettes from any webpage.

extensions.name: LinkChecker
extensions.summary: Scans and highlights broken links on any page.

extensions.name: DOM Snapshot
extensions.summary: Capture and export DOM structures quickly.

extensions.name: ConsolePlus
extensions.summary: Enhanced developer console with advanced filtering and logging.
